==Chinese==

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron

|cat=n

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# "Qi-activating" ''[[w:Materia medica|materia medica]]'' in [[traditional Chinese medicine]]. This term refers to herbs and other medicinal substances that are used to activate or regulate the "qi" or energy in the body.
